    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"

>
[Predictive Purchase (Rogue)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1798) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 136 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You somehow manage to have just the thing for the situation. You gain the [Prescient Planner](/Feats.aspx?ID=2143) and [Prescient Consumable](/Feats.aspx?ID=2142) feats. When using Prescient Planner, you can draw the item from your [backpack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=4) (or a similar container) as a 2-action activity, instead of taking 1 minute to do so.

<title level="2">Predictive Purchase (Rogue) leads to...</title>
[Implausible Purchase (Rogue)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1809)
name: Predictive Purchase (Rogue)
